No shit, I saw the Dem's literally "steal" the election away from Bernie. I don't care about Trumps stupid shit or any other idiot spouting off bullshit cause I saw them steal that election away from Bernie...

A lot places that she won also excluded independents and/or had weird rules for registering to vote.  Like in NY,  you had to be registered as a Democrat months in advanced, before most people even had that in there mind. I had to register as Democrat in California to avoid the confusion of how to vote as an independent(take in mind most states don't have that option). Been randomly deregistered as Democrat and registered as a Green Party voter in California.  Had to re-register as Democrat again to vote.  I consider myself a left wing independent, but reluctantly am a registered Democrat because I would like to easily participate in the primaries. I still check my registration out of paranoia.
